title: Elly Schlein - Wikipedia
snippet: Elena Ethel "Elly" Schlein (Italian: [ˈɛlli ˈʃlain]; born 4 May 1985) is an Italian politician who has been serving as the secretary of the Democratic Party (PD) since 12 March 2023. She is a member of Italy's Chamber of Deputies and was previously the vice president of Emilia-Romagna and ...

title: Italy's left picks 'anti-Meloni' politician Elly Schlein to lead the party | Euronews
snippet: Elly Schlein at an electoral rally in Modena, Italy. 2 September 2022 - AP Photo/Marco Vasini ... Italy's centre-left Democratic Party (PD) has selected Elly Schlein as its new leader.

title: Meet the anti-Renzi: Elly Schlein becomes first woman leader of Italy’s center left
snippet: ... Elly Schlein has become the youngest leader and first woman at the helm of the PD | Fabio Frustaci/EPA-EFE ... Radical candidate Elly Schlein is the new leader of Italy’s traditionally center-left Democratic Party (PD), ...

title: Elly Schlein: The first woman and LGBTIQ+ leader of Italy’s left | openDemocracy
snippet: Another woman has shaken up Italy’s male-dominated political scene – but this time, she’s a feminist, openly queer and left-wing. Say hello to Elly Schlein, 37, the new head of the progressive Democratic Party (PD).

title: Elly Schlein voted leader of Italy’s most important leftwing party in surprise win | Italy | The Guardian
snippet: Vocal on social justice issues, Schlein, an Italian-American national, has been compared in Italy to the New York congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez. She rejoined the Democratic party after leaving in 2015 out of frustration over the direction ...
